name: Endless (Ludum Dare #47)
description:
This is a little game I put together for Ludum Dare #47, so don't expect it to be very fun or a lot of content, I made it in under 48 hours. The theme was "Stuck in a loop", and what this game (hopefully) represents is struggle and being stuck in a dark circle and feeling like days just repeats themselves.

 I hope that it might shine a little light on mental health and the people struggling with it (Not saying that everyone who struggles with it live like the guy in the game, that is only one example).

I hope you will try it out anyways as this is the first game I have ever released to the public.
